ygData.subject: Re: faction with FP rogues
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One of my guildmates just found this quest.  I m hoping my faction in FP will let me do it... even if I have to invis past the guards. Now she s doing it
ygData.messageBody:
Grant Vanderhule wrote:
>
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> i THINK that giving 4 orc pawn picks to one of the merchants at habard's
> resales in east fp will raise faction with numerous FP groups, with no
> decreases.. but i dont remember at this point whether the rogues are among
> them. worth a try, anyway. by doing so you also get a lottery ticket from
> highpass, which will randomly be a winning number that could result in
> something interesting, but nobody is quite sure yet..
>

One of my guildmates just found this quest. I'm hoping my faction
in FP will let me do it... even if I have to invis past the guards.
Now she's doing it to try for the winning ticket =)

Xilith
